title: ISic003560. An antiquarian 'forgery'
body:
Facsimile Images

1ΘΚΔ
2ΧΑΙΡΕΠΑΡΟΔΕΙΤΑ
3ΧΑΙΡΕΤΕΠΟΝΠΕΤΕΚΝΙΟΝ
4ΕΝΘΑΔΕΚΕΤΕ
5ΘΑΝΕΙΝΠΕΠΡΟΤΑΙ
6ΠΑΣΙΝ

l.5 reg., orig. πέπροται

Apparatus criticus

  • Text based on comparison of Kaibel, Filippi and SEG, prioritising Kaibel's transcription of the manuscript tradition.;
  • 3: Kaibel notes that the likely source texts all read ΓΟΝΓΕ

translation

commentary

As Korhonen lucidly details, the inscription is one of a series of late 18th century local antiquarian forgeries, constructed on the basis of existing texts, principally those to be found in the 1769 first edition of the corpus of Torremuzza. Kaibel classed the entire series already as forgeries in IG XIV.

bibliography

  • 14.0029* https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001072
  • 52.0905 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
  • Filippi 2002 75 no. 14/6 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001991
  • Filippi 2005 69 no.14/6 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002296
  • Korhonen 2017 199 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001484
